steps.description: Go to Qeynos Catacombs and find Reania Jukle. Give her Shining Metallic Robes, Quill, and Piece of Parchment to receive Jeb’s Seal.
Go to East Cabilis and kill Vessel Drozlin to loot Xolion Rod.
Go to Neriak Third Gate and kill Verina Tomb to loot Innoruuk’s Word.
Go to Chardok and kill Prince Selrach Di’Zok to loot Head of a Prince. Give Head of a Prince to Joren Nobleheart in South Felwithe to receive Chalice of Kings.
Go to Oggok and complete the Snow Blossom quest to receive Snow Blossom.

Combine Xolion Rod, Innoruuk’s Word, Chalice of Kings, and Snow Blossom in Enchanter’s Sack to create Sack for Modani. Give Sack for Modani to Modani Qu`Loni in The Overthere to receive 1st Piece of Staff.
Go to South Ro and kill Cazel to loot Spoon.
Loot The One Key (ground spawn) in The Overthere.
Loot Lost Scroll (ground spawn) in Dalnir.
Loot Charm and Sacrifice (ground spawn) in Plane of Sky Quest room.
Combine Spoon, The One Key, Lost Scroll, and Charm and Sacrifice in Enchanter’s Sack to create Sack for Mizzle. Give Sack for Mizzle to Clockwork VIIX in Ak’Anon to receive 2nd Piece of Staff.
Buy Dull Diamond, Dull Sapphire, Dull Emerald, and Dull Ruby from Nadia Starfeast in Firiona Vie.
Give Dull Diamond to a charmed spectral librarian in Kaesora to receive Enchanted Diamond.
Give Dull Sapphire to a charmed Felia Goldwing in Skyfire Mountains to receive Enchanted Sapphire.
Give Dull Emerald to a charmed Impaler Tzilug in The Overthere to receive Enchanted Emerald.
Give Dull Ruby to a charmed Wraith of Jaxion in City of Mist to receive Enchanted Ruby.

Combine Enchanted Diamond, Enchanted Sapphire, Enchanted Emerald, and Enchanted Ruby in Enchanter’s Sack to create Sack for Nadia. Give Sack for Nadia to Nadia Starfeast in Firiona Vie to receive 3rd Piece of Staff.
Go to Plane of Fear and kill Wraith of the Shissar to loot Head of the Serpent.
Go to Plane of Hate and kill forsaken revenant to loot Essence of a Vampire.
Go to Field of Bone and kill The Tangrin to loot Sands of the Mystics.
Go to The Hole and kill Ghost of Kindle to loot Essence of a Ghost.

Combine Head of the Serpent, Essence of a Vampire, Sands of the Mystics, and Essence of a Ghost in Enchanter’s Sack to create Sack for Polzin. Give Sack for Polzin to Polzin Mrid in The Hole to receive 4th Piece of Staff.
Combine 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th Piece of Staff in Enchanter’s Sack to receive Bundle of Staves. Give Bundle of Staves to a sarnak imitator in Burning Woods to receive Staff of the Serpent.
